attributes.action: Repeal amendment to the 2003 Communications Act
attributes.additional_details:
Government today amended 2003 Communications Act to ban the following from pornography online:
Spanking
Caning
Aggressive whipping
Penetration by any object "associated with violence"
Physical or verbal abuse (regardless of  if consensual)
Urolagnia (known as "water sports")
Female ejaculation
Strangulation
Facesitting
Fisting

A great deal of which seems to be targeting female pleasure as well as acts which particularly feature in gay pornography.
Moreover, they are consensual acts by adults watched by consenting adults.
We are telling you to stop interfering with non-issues.
